text: "Walk of Life" is a song by Dire Straits. It is the third song on the band's fifth album, Brothers in Arms (1985). It was also on the live album On the Night. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 1 in Ireland, number 3 in New Zealand, number 2 in South Africa and number 7 in the United States. == References == Category:1985 songs Category:Dire Straits songs
title: Walk of Life
